description:
As a user
    I want to be able to create, remove tasks and dates, and change status of tasks.
name: Tasks organization

steps.name: I open sprint-grid web application page with page title as 'SprintGridApp'
I click on add task plus + button
I fill task name as 'Unique Task'
I click on Add button for task input
I am able to add a new task row as 'Unique Task'
I clear the text in Add task input field
I see the task input placeholder value as 'Fill the task title, please'
I see validation message for task input field as 'The title is required'

result.error_message:
AssertionError
    + expected - actual

    -The title is requined
    +The title is required

    at SprintGrid.verifyTaskValidationMsg (/Users/aditya/Desktop/testv1/sprint-grid-automation-v1/e2e/features/step_definitions/e2e.js:59:34)
    at processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:96:5)
    at async SprintGrid.<anonymous> (/Users/aditya/Desktop/testv1/sprint-grid-automation-v1/e2e/features/step_definitions/sprintGridStepDef.js:42:10)

steps.name: I see validation message text color for task input field as 'rgb(244, 67, 54)'
I see the Add button for adding task is disabled
I fill task name as 'Unique Task'
I see validation for task input field as 'The task with such name already exists'
I see the Add button for adding task is disabled
I click on close task button X
The add task input field is collapsed
I open sprint-grid web application page with page title as 'SprintGridApp'
I click on Add date column + button
I click on the datepicker icon
I select the date from datepicker
I click on Add button for date column
I am able to create a new date column as 'Dec 25, 2030'
I clear the date from date input field
I see the date input placeholder value as 'Fill the date, please'
I see a validation message for date input field as 'Date is required'
I see validation message text color for date input field as 'rgb(244, 67, 54)'
I see the Add button for adding date is disabled
I enter date and verify validation msg for incorrect date formats as 'Follow the format mm/dd/yyyy'

result.error_message:
AssertionError
    + expected - actual

    -false
    +true

    at SprintGrid.verifyDateValidationMsg2 (/Users/aditya/Desktop/testv1/sprint-grid-automation-v1/e2e/features/step_definitions/e2e.js:160:28)
    at async SprintGrid.<anonymous> (/Users/aditya/Desktop/testv1/sprint-grid-automation-v1/e2e/features/step_definitions/sprintGridStepDef.js:106:10)

steps.name: I see the Add button for adding date is disabled
I enter date as '12/12/2022'
I click on Add button for date column
I am able to create a new date column as 'Dec 12, 2022'
I clear the date from date input field
I enter date as '12/12/2022'
I see a validation for date input field as 'This date already exists'
I see the Add button for adding date is disabled
I click on close date column button X
The date column input field is collapsed
I open sprint-grid web application page with page title as 'SprintGridApp'
I click on an empty cell
The placeholder text for input field is 'Set Status'

result.error_message:
AssertionError
    + expected - actual

    -Create status
    +Set Status

    at SprintGrid.verifyPlaceholderText (/Users/aditya/Desktop/testv1/sprint-grid-automation-v1/e2e/features/step_definitions/e2e.js:199:27)
    at processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:96:5)
    at async SprintGrid.<anonymous> (/Users/aditya/Desktop/testv1/sprint-grid-automation-v1/e2e/features/step_definitions/sprintGridStepDef.js:132:10)

steps.name: I click on an input field
I see statuses list as
I select 'To Do' status
The cell collapse
Cell has 'To Do' status now
I click on a cell with status as 'To Do'
I enter "randomstatus" text in the cell input field
The existing status 'To Do' on cell is not changed
I open sprint-grid web application page with page title as 'SprintGridApp'

The placeholder text for input field is 'Set Status'

steps.name: I click on an input field
I see statuses list as
I select 'Done' status
The cell collapse
Cell has 'Done' status now
I click on a cell with status as 'Done'
I enter "randomstatus" text in the cell input field
The existing status 'Done' on cell is not changed
I open sprint-grid web application page with page title as 'SprintGridApp'
I hover over the 'Task 1' row
I see remove row button
I click on remove task row button
The task row with name 'Task 1' is deleted
I hover over the date column 'Jun 1, 2020'
I see remove column button
I click on remove date column button
The date column with date 'Jun 1, 2020' is deleted
I open sprint-grid web application page with page title as 'SprintGridApp'
I hover over the 'Task 2' row
I see remove row button
I click on remove task row button
The task row with name 'Task 2' is deleted
I hover over the date column 'May 2, 2020'
I see remove column button
I click on remove date column button
The date column with date 'May 2, 2020' is deleted
